data.description: Tree Structured HTML with JavaScript code
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows Tree Structured HTML presentation in a web page.
    Tree can be specified as an arrayref (node and its properties) or as
    hash ref. This will be useful in web pages where tree structured
    info is presented. It gives the fat-client like user experience in a
    web browser.
